text:
The ContentImpl has problem with uri's with additional slashes. So if I make a
collection with 'mkcol /files/test4/' the RevisionDescriptors has the uri
'/files/test4/'. But couldn't be found by '/files/test4'

----------- XMLMemDescriptorsStore createRevisionDescriptors 2/n
uri=/files/test4 aProps=slidestore.file.UriProperties@197a9c75
----------- XMLMemDescriptorsStore createRevisionDescriptor 1/n uri=/files/test4
aProps=slidestore.file.UriProperties@197a9c75
----------- XMLMemDescriptorsStore createRevisionDescriptor 2/n uri=/files/test4
aProps=slidestore.file.UriProperties@197a9c75
----------- XMLMemDescriptorsStore storeRevisionDescriptors 1/n uri=/files/test4
aProps=slidestore.file.UriProperties@197a9c75
revisionDescriptors.uri/files/test4/
storeRevisionDescriptors ReDesUri=/files/test4/ uri=/files/test4
org.apache.slide.content.RevisionDescriptorNotFoundException: No revision
descriptor found on object /files/test4
	at
slidestore.file.AbstractUriProperties.storeRevisionDescriptors(AbstractUriProperties.java:393)
	at
slidestore.file.XMLFileDescriptorsStore.storeRevisionDescriptors(XMLFileDescriptorsStore.java:547)
creator: stephan@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 2554
Patch for ContentImpl.java to resolve the problem.
creator: stephan@apache.org
cmlenz@apache.org
text:
Although I couldn't reproduce the problem, the patch looked good to I've applied
it. Thanks!
